I am 5.6ft/127lbs & the pockets are literally at the level on my breast. Decided to keep it. Will eliminate the pockets & adjust, to wear it as an open shoulder shawl.

I bought this as a part of my 1920’s Halloween costume for a wedding last weekend.  This stole traveled well in a suitcase rolled up.  It was warm and looked great with my sequined 1920’s inspired dress and accessories.  It has two hooks that allow you to wrap around your shoulder without having to hold it.  The bottom hook wouldn’t stay but the top was enough to do the job.  It has pockets and is lined with a reasonably comfortable fabric.  it also looks great thrown over one shoulder if you don’t need your shoulders covered.  I had so many compliments.  Totally recommend!
I used it for a wedding and it was very admired. Perfect color Ang length. Nice and warm
As long as no one pets it- it looks real! It’s the perfect size and fit! Exactly what I was looking for😬😊😉
This shawl fur is the softest and can be worn with anything from funky jeans to sleek dress

Extremely comfortable!

It’s okay for the price but could have been made better. If you’re looking for a one time cheap shawl this is it. If you are looking for some to wear often this isn’t probably what you want. Absolutely a beautiful wrap. I bought it for a 1920s costume party, but have been using it going out in the evening. It elevates even a more casual outfit and keeps me perfectly warm.

I initially purchased this for myself for a masquerade ball. It was a little too small for my liking. I think it could have worked if the pockets were not placed in such a strange way.  There is a hook and eye as well, but the placement made it feel like it was sitting a little too high. I typically wear an XL so even though it is labeled as one size fits most, it might not fit XL and up.  I gave it to my daughter who is a small and it worked really well for her. She choose to wear it over her shoulder and it looked fabulous.

I LOVE this piece.  Felt like a queen.  Super soft.  It needs fluffing out the bag though.  The leather- like under side could be seen without the fluffing.  I'd go over it with a steamer to fluff the fir out the bag then let hang.  The under side is black and matches the fir color so no big deal.  It has POCKETS!  Which help keep it on your shoulders.  I chose to wear over one shoulder (Coming to America style (movie)...lol) so the dress could still be showcased.  It's long enough to go around both shoulders as well.  Beautiful piece to elevate any gown during cold months.
This item comes smashed inside a plastic bag and is very cheap material.  The fur is flat and doesn't look fluffy like pictured.  This is getting returned.

I have to return it because I know I can't wear this to a wedding..
